text: Egha aning dughiar maba mong Antioghɨn me ko ike. Ezɨ gɨn Kraisɨn adarazi navir amɨrizim sara me amadazɨ, me Jerusalemɨn uamategha gumazir me amangiziba bagha zui.15:33-34 Fofozir gumazir maba uaghan kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir mam uaghan kagh iti. Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam kamaghɨn ghu, “Ezɨ Sailas uan nɨghnɨzim gɨn ghua Antioghɨn iti.”
